short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove or highlight search images by keyword in domain (for google and yandex)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This program will make image searching more convenient. 
Highlight results from preferred sites. 
Hide results from intrusive sites or untrusted domain zones.
Find out the number of results that meet your criteria.
Works in google and yandex.
